Class AudioProperty.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.AudioProperty.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AudioProperty

    public static class AudioProperty.Builder
extends Object
    Static inner class of AudioProperty to create an AudioProperty object.
